content.title: Jumma Mubarak
content.arabic_text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ وَمَلَائِكَتَهُ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ
content.translation: Beshak Allah aur uske farishte Nabi (SAW) par durood bhejte hain.
content.description: Aaj ke din Durood shareef ki kasrat karein.

content.title: Sabar Ka Phal
content.translation: Allah sabar karne walon ke saath hai.
content.description: Mushkil waqt mein ghabrana nahi chahiye.
